website_summaries.verdict: This alarm provides an extra layer of motorcycle insurance no matter the weather.
pros: This may be the alarm for you if you live in a rainy area
Made from waterproof silicone, this 125-decibel alarm features low power consumption and remote start capabilities for those days when the weather won’t quit
The alarm ties into your vehicle’s lights, so the turn signals will flash to confirm activation
cons: We have some longevity concerns as there have been reports of the alarm ceasing operating after a couple months

customer_reviews.title: Plugged right in!
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup and nice quality remotes! Extremely loud.. (almost too loud) but that’s the point. I have a Chinese Scooter and it literally just plugged right in didn’t have to do anything else. Remote start is the coolest and most pointless feature ever. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: 1080p

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very sensitive and loud. Remote works well. I will only use the alarm feature. No need for remote start. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Bang For The Buck!
customer_reviews.text: This system is great! I set it up in less than an hour, works perfectly! I was worried that it would not be loud enough to be effective, I was very surprised at just how loud this alarm is! This will wake me up from a dead sleep no problem. I adjusted the sensitivity and do not worry about false alarms. Definitely worth every penny! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shane T.

customer_reviews.title: At the minute
customer_reviews.text: It Delivered on Apr 30, 2018 and I installed it the next day. It quit working today June 18, 2018. It was doing GREAT, making the lights flash and sounding the alarm. Too bad it only lasted long enough to get past Amazon's 30 day return limit.
customer_reviews.author: NWA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Used it just for the alarm. And it's very loud! Works well and gets the job done. 20 minutes to install. Just put the red cable to positive and black cable to negative on the battery terminals. Plug the speaker in and mount it on your bike under it, in the front or in the seat. The tape is strong and durable. Would buy again. Again, the alarm is VERY loud! Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Terrigno

customer_reviews.title: Best for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Update: Today I took my bike to the mall as I was walking away from my bike I pushed alarm button like I always do and nothing happened no chirp no nothing pushed it again nothing so I went home got my other remote tried that nothing while I was at the mall I did check the fuse it was fine so I'm baffled I will contacted the seller see what up hopefully he'll contact me first after reading this Original: Great alarm im loving it easy to install ramotes work great SELLER PLEASE CONTACT ME IN HOW TO SET THE SENSITIVITY OF THE SCHOCK SENSOR thank you great product
customer_reviews.author: Ou812

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I just hooked it up yesterday and it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I just hooked it up yesterday and it works perfect so far. Very easy installation, really only three wires plus ground if you dont care about the flashing lights. Box looks pretty durable, well see how it holds up. All in all very easy and good product, works right out of the box like it should. ps. dont mix up the red and orange wires when youre installing otherwise the box only works when your key is on.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulraheem Khan

customer_reviews.title: It's loud and sensitive, but that's what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: It took me literally few minutes to install when I took the front cover off my moped. It's very loud, almost too loud but that's what I wanted so it works for me. Only thing is when I use moped cover for rainy day and when it's windy, it triggers the alarm as it is very sensitive. I wished there was a way to adjust the sensitivity but for the price and ease of installation, I'll still give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: remote start it's cool
customer_reviews.text: It works and I love it a must buy with the alarm on it now my scooter is safe from theft and remote start is cool
customer_reviews.author: Super Star Light

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and distinctive alarm sound, very easy to install in less than 15 mins.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on. Went off that very night and the neighbor chased away a thief trying to remove my battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install device. Got mine installed within 15 minutes, all you need for simple installation are 2 flat surfaces (1 for alarm horn, 1 for device). I like that it has 3 ways for installation: 1-Sound only; 2-Sound and lights; 3-Sound, lights and ignition cut off. Bought 2 units, both work well.
customer_reviews.author: abm Heijblom

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm I will tell you right now is EAR PIERCING. The sensor is very good on it and I can tell you no one will be taking my bike anytime soon. I did not hook up the remote start or the immobilizer since I do not have my bikes wiring diagram at the moment but will soon. Installation is very simple if you have your bikes diagram. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Exact plug and play fit
customer_reviews.text: This plug and play unit fits the Tank model scooters that came with the Little Flying Fighter units. The only thing that is different is it does not have an external ground, that is in the harness so no worries if it looks like it would not work. It uses the ground within the harness instead od Chassis ground.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping fast but product is poor quality, it does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this product again. I did not know what happened when a technician was installing it, it does work very well the first time but then it was burning my wires on my motorcycle, wow but this alarm is dangerous. Nobody buys this please, if you do not wanna see your motorcycle in a picture as memories.
customer_reviews.author: Marco D.

customer_reviews.title: Rupse Waterproof Motorcycle Bike Anti-Theft Security Burglar Alarm System Remote Control Horn Alarm
customer_reviews.text: for the price, you can't beat it, i only use it for the alarm for now, it was super easy to install, just 2 wires for the alarm and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Perkins

customer_reviews.title: cheap and junk
customer_reviews.text: good product but alarm acting up already after a month of having it. set the alarm an in 5 mins starts going off with nothing touching it. does it ever 5mins its a cheap an defective product dont buy save money an get something better to protect your bike with
customer_reviews.author: jd cruze

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Installed with proper connections. Worked one time. Drove and checked connections, nothing. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This was plug and play right into my scooter. It was super easy to set up, and easy to use. It does drain the battery, but you should already have your scooter on a battery tender anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Shapley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install with instructions. Sensor is very sensitive with just a light bump will set it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B

customer_reviews.title: Work 💯 percent to ward off crimenals and electric start convenience and cheap but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Soon to up load a vid to you tube cause there are not any that show how this is done but all in all it was easy to install and it works great strong alarm and electric start even better
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD JAMES KENNEDY

customer_reviews.title: ALARM NOT SENSITIVE ENOUGH.
customer_reviews.text: THE ALARM IS NOT VERY SENSITIVE. I CAN TOUCH THE MOPED & NOT DISARM THE ALARM. MY OTHER ALARM, IF YOU TOUCH THE MOPED WITH THE TIP OF YOUR FINGER, IT WOULD ALARM.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW C.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I tried on multiple bikes and scooters with the same results. Draining of battery, Seller presumed manufacturer defect and promised a refund, so due to amazing customer service! satisfaction is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Harding

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install, and LOUD
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on Hawk 250 enduro and I cant believe how easy installation was. I didnt want the remote start so I literally just hooked the red wire to the battery positive terminal and the black to the negative and it was working. It is very sensitive and very loud. For 16$ it is an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Too many false alarms - otherwise great potential
customer_reviews.text: Installed just with power from battery - ended up removing as it was to sensitive and too many false alarms Great concept but too many false alarms meant it was never used.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Very loud horn, great sensitivity features, drains battery
customer_reviews.text: Product drains the battery too much, even when deactivated, took me a whole day to recharge my bike. Works really well, but I suggest keeping it on a power supply or completely disconnecting it. Issue might not be a problem for those who ride every day.
customer_reviews.author: JulieEnglish

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Would not start my bike. running lights came on when plugged in, and would not go off. Had to unplug it to keep battery from running down.
customer_reviews.author: Tom cat

customer_reviews.title: not overnight alarm worthy
customer_reviews.text: directions translated from Chinese so not very legible. Can't use overnight because it goes off at random
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the remote start!!!!!!! Remember dont leave bike in gear!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy once you find your own starter wire. So pleased with this product!!! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bill Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable alarm system.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so I can leave my bike outside at night, only used the alarm feature. Very easy to install and alarm is super loud. Doesn’t seem to drain battery like some people say. Worth the money to me.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good alarm, works good and and was pretty easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions before instalation
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a kawasaki vulcan 900 Works great
customer_reviews.author: Juan Alcaraz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike alarm, easy installation and very easy to use. Must have to keep your bike safe.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Delima

customer_reviews.title: ... install was while they watched and the price expecaly pleased them. Two days later I got a call ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer was surprised that it came as quick as it did and how quick the install was while they watched and the price expecaly pleased them. Two days later I got a call to tell me how loud it was
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drains battrys even when turned off
customer_reviews.text: It kills the battry of my brand new bike. Even when unarmed it still finds a way to kill the battrty. I would find a diffent product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon lee Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Alarm goes off about every 15 minutes for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: AR15

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: no issues with the installation very very loud i love it
customer_reviews.author: Joel P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a sn\mall issue and it was replaced no questions ask. Also works great
customer_reviews.author: Mike N forino

customer_reviews.title: Screws in clickers just spin around, cheap, but also cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these same alarms before and no problems, this one (so far, haven't even tried to install it) has issues with both clickers. Went to install new (quality, ie; not Chinese) batteries in the clickers and can't. The bottom screws on each one just spins around. I'll probably pull the screws and glue back in, but still...
customer_reviews.author: TRJ

customer_reviews.title: For all of you how wish you had a remote ...
customer_reviews.text: For all of you who wish you had a remote start on electric start generator just get this one and save yourself about $40 buying the remote generator kit. Just don't hook up the yellows and orange wires. The flame out wires are generally black off the switch just trace the wire coming from the coil mine had a bullet connector so no cutting. You also get two remotes instead of one. Don't use the horn.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: easy installing. Remotes work from pretty good distance
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, easy installing. Remotes work from pretty good distance. Did not with in remote start, only using for alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Kett

product_meta.title: Rupse Waterproof Motorcycle Bike Anti-Theft Security Burglar Alarm System Remote Control Horn Alarm Warner Bi-Color
product_meta.description:
Note: Powerful Horn Alarm With 5 Sensitivity Levels Adjustable, Goes With Turn Signal Light Flashing.You can contact us to get the video if you do not know how to adjust it.

Basic parameters:
Color: black
Material: ABS
Packing size: about 19*15*4.5cm/7.48"*5.9"*1.77"
Host size: about 6.5*2.3*7cm/2.55"*0.9"*2.75"
Working voltage: DC 12V
Remote control : (built-in button battery)
Horn sound level: 125dB
Connection mode:
Red/black: positive power supply/negative
Orange: anode cable of electric door lock
Gray/pink: flameout cable
Blue: positive start cable
Yellow: left and right turn signal

Package:
Host *1
Remote Control *2
Horn *1
Wire *1
Manual *1
Double-sided Adhesive Tape *1
feature_bullets: Automatic remote start/off for keyless driving and guard against theft & robbery;One key for car searching, overtaking warning, Permanent memory once setting.
Powerful Horn Alarm With 5 Sensitivity Levels Adjustable, Goes With Turn Signal Light Flashing.
Host device made of waterproof silicone, with better waterproofing, Ultra-low power consumption, prevents loss of battery current.
Using dynamic password, defend against copying for stealing.
Remote control double lights flashing under driving or undefended condition for emergency or deal with bad weather, completely replace double lights flashing controlled switch.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
